name: Backstory Cards: Expansion Pack #3 for Foundry VTT
name_original: Backstory Cards: Expansion Pack #3 for Foundry VTT
description:
This module can be used with any game system for Foundry Virtual Tabletop, which requires a Foundry VTT license.

The module includes:

  • Interactive Journal Entries for setting element cards as well as Setting Element Card Anatomy, Setting Elements Tips, Motivations Tips, and Instructions.
  • Rollable Tables for each setting element type from which you can draw setting element cards.
  • A Macro for drawing setting element cards from the Rollable Tables.
Get the Core Deck

Start creating rich backstories and deep connections with the original Backstory Cards!

Expand Your Collection

Want more Backstory Cards to add to your deck?

Expansion Pack #1: Distant Worlds, Unseen Threats, & Wicked Shadows

Expansion Pack #1 includes 45 genre-specific prompts for science-fiction, horror, and noir intrigue.

Expansion Pack #2: Even More

Expansion Pack #2 gives you Even More (literally), which expands on the core deck and the themes presented in Expansion Pack #1.
